plays.text: Goal scored by Stephane Veilleux assisted by Nick Schultz and Cal Clutterbuck

Penalty to Martin Skoula 2 minutes for Hooking Bobby Ryan
Penalty to Corey Perry 2 minutes for Slashing John Scott

Goal scored by Scott Niedermayer assisted by Corey Perry and Ryan Getzlaf
